reviewText: The worst use of the Speed Racer license, I've seen far better effort put into animation and character designs and this is just a disgraceful steaming pile. Really wish Tatsunoko would buy back Speed Racer so the series can't crash and burn anymore than it already has.

My 8 yo rented this from the library and I am in shock that the owners of the speed racer franchise would let this be produced and distributed. The story is bad, the animation is horrible and writing of the characters is just as bad.  Save yourself.
I'm amazed. A stop motion cartoon would have been a better allocation of budget for this company. Even if looking for something to entertain your one-year-old, you can do better.
